attribute.description: Type of the charts, possible values are line, spline, area, column, bar and pie
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: List of HTML colors for the chart series. Defaults to "#2f7ed8,#0d233a,#8bbc21,#910000,#1aadce,#492970,#f28f43,#77a1e5,#c42525,#a6c96a".
attribute.name: colors

attribute.description: Datasource of the component, can be a Collection or Map type. Provide either a value, a model or chartseries as children declared in the xhtml file.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Datasource of the component, must implement the ChartModel interface. Provide either a value, a model or chartseries as children declared in the xhtml file.
attribute.name: model

attribute.description: ValueExpression of the currently selected Series.
attribute.name: selectedSeries

attribute.description: ValueExpression of the currently selected Point inside the selected Series. This corresponds to the category/value of the x axis.
attribute.name: selectedPoint

attribute.description: JavaScript to be executed on point selection.
attribute.name: onselect

attribute.description: Height of chart in px
attribute.name: height

attribute.description: Width of chart in px
attribute.name: width

attribute.description: Title for the chart
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: Credits text for the chart
attribute.name: credits

attribute.description: Zoom type text for the chart
attribute.name: zoomType

attribute.description: Sub Title for the chart
attribute.name: subTitle

attribute.description: Label for x-axis
attribute.name: xaxisLabel

attribute.description: Label for y-axis
attribute.name: yaxisLabel

attribute.description: Name of the request scoped variable used as iterator for value
attribute.name: var

attribute.description: Index of currently rendered item during iteration over the Collection in value-Attribute
attribute.name: rowIndexVar

attribute.description: ValueExpression of the value of a point, bar,... Only valid if used in combinatino with value.
attribute.name: point

attribute.description: ValueExpression of the tickLabel for a single point. Only valid if used in combinatino with value.
attribute.name: tickLabel

attribute.description: ID of rerender component for ajax actions
attribute.name: render

attribute.description: JavaScript function name for client side customization. All highcharts configuration options are available inside the function using 'this'.
attribute.name: extender

attribute.description: Whether to stack the values of each series on top of each other. Possible values are 'none', 'normal' or 'percent', defaulting to 'none'.
attribute.name: stacking

attribute.description: If set, this is the time interval in seconds that the updateMethod will be called and series data will change.
attribute.name: updateInterval

attribute.description: How many points should be always visible in the chart in liveUpdate mode ? Defaults to 20.
attribute.name: updateCapacity

attribute.description: This method will be called via AJAX each time, the chart needs to update the visible data. Use it to change or add data to the displayed series.
attribute.name: updateMethod

attribute.description: JavaScript to be executed on mouse over event.
attribute.name: onmouseover

attribute.description: JavaScript to be executed on mouse over event.
attribute.name: onmouseoverpoint

attribute.description: Sets the alpha 3D option. Setting this attribute to any value will automatically turn on 3D effects.
attribute.name: alpha3d

attribute.description: Sets the beta 3D option. Setting this attribute to any value will automatically turn on 3D effects.
attribute.name: beta3d

attribute.description: Sets the depth 3D option. Setting this attribute to any value will automatically turn on 3D effects.
attribute.name: depth3d

attribute.description: Sets the viewDistance 3D option. Setting this attribute to any value will automatically turn on 3D effects.
attribute.name: viewDistance3d

attribute.description: Type of the charts, possible values are line, area, column and bar
attribute.name: name

attribute.description: Datasource of the component, can be a Collection or Map type. Provide either a value, a model or chartseries as children declared in the xhtml file.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Name of the request scoped variable used as iterator for value
attribute.name: var

attribute.description: Type of this series. If not provided, it defaults to the chart's type.
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: ValueExpression of the value of a point, bar,... Only valid if used in combination with value.
attribute.name: point

attribute.description: ValueExpression of the tickLabel for a single point. Only valid if used in combination with value.
attribute.name: tickLabel

attribute.description: How the data Label shall be displayed. If not provided, the corresponding x axis entry or name of the point is used.
attribute.name: dataLabel

attribute.description: ID of the ChartAxis if not the primary should be used for this series.
attribute.name: yaxis

attribute.description: Change the color for each point instead of having the same color for the whole series. Defaults to false.
attribute.name: colorByPoint

attribute.description: Position of this axis. Possible values are n, w, s or e.
attribute.name: position

attribute.description: Angle in degrees if the tickLabel should be rotated. Defaults to 0.
attribute.name: tickAngle

attribute.description: Color of the gridline for this axis within the chart.
attribute.name: gridLineColor

attribute.description: Width of the gridline for this axis within the chart. Use 0 to not display a gridline.
attribute.name: gridLineWidth

attribute.description: Type of this axis. Possible values are linear, category and datetime, defaulting to linear.
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: Label-Style of this axis. Use CSS definition style to e.g. define a color.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Title of this axis.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: Label-Format of this axis. To display e.g. mm use "{value} mm"
attribute.name: format

attribute.description: Minimum value for this axis
attribute.name: min

attribute.description: Maximum value for this axis
attribute.name: max

attribute.description: Relative component which is reset zoom button related to
attribute.name: relativeTo

attribute.description: Reset zoom button alignment
attribute.name: align

attribute.description: Reset zoom button vertical alignment
attribute.name: verticalAlign

attribute.description: X position of reset zoom button
attribute.name: x

attribute.description: Y position of reset zoom button
attribute.name: y

attribute.description: Position of the legend. Possible values are n, w, s, e and combinations like ne, nw, se, sw
attribute.name: position

attribute.description: Title for the legend.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: CSS styles for the legend.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Show the legend at all ? true or false, defaults to true.
attribute.name: enabled

attribute.description: HTML Background color for the legend
attribute.name: backgroundColor

attribute.description: CSS styles for the legend.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Share one tooltip across all series. If true, the values for each tick will be shown instead of only the hovered point.
attribute.name: shared

attribute.description: HTML Background color for the legend
attribute.name: backgroundColor

attribute.description: Type of the charts, possible values are heatmap, treemap
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: Datasource of the component, can be a Collection or Map type. Provide either a value, a model or chartseries as children declared in the xhtml file.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Datasource of the component, must implement the ChartModel interface. Provide either a value, a model or chartseries as children declared in the xhtml file.
attribute.name: model

attribute.description: ValueExpression of the currently selected Point inside the selected Series. This corresponds to the category/value of the x axis.
attribute.name: selectedPoint

attribute.description: JavaScript to be executed on point selection.
attribute.name: onselect

attribute.description: Height of chart in px
attribute.name: height

attribute.description: Width of chart in px
attribute.name: width

attribute.description: Title for the chart
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: Credits text for the chart
attribute.name: credits

attribute.description: Sub Title for the chart
attribute.name: subTitle

attribute.description: Label for x-axis
attribute.name: xaxisLabel

attribute.description: Label for y-axis
attribute.name: yaxisLabel

attribute.description: Name of the request scoped variable used as iterator for value
attribute.name: var

attribute.description: Index of currently rendered item during iteration over the Collection in value-Attribute
attribute.name: rowIndexVar

attribute.description: ValueExpression of the value of an entry. Only valid if used in combination with value.
attribute.name: point

attribute.description: ValueExpression; where on the xaxis to place an entry. Only valid if used in combination with value.
attribute.name: xvalue

attribute.description: ValueExpression; where on the yaxis to place an entry. Only valid if used in combination with value.
attribute.name: yvalue

attribute.description: Color for the lowest value, use HTML color format
attribute.name: minColor

attribute.description: Color for the highest value, use HTML color format
attribute.name: maxColor

attribute.description: Minimum value for the color axis
attribute.name: min

attribute.description: Which layout algorithm to use; can be squarified, sliceAndDice
attribute.name: layout

attribute.description: Control if you want to show the value in each heat box cell. Defaults to false
attribute.name: showDataLabel

attribute.description: Width of the border to draw around panels within the map. Default is 0
attribute.name: borderWidth

attribute.description: ID of rerender component for ajax actions
attribute.name: render

attribute.description: JavaScript function name for client side customization. All highcharts configuration options are available inside the function using 'this'.
attribute.name: extender

attribute.description: ValueExpression of the currently selected Series.
attribute.name: selectedSeries

attribute.description: ValueExpression of the currently selected Point inside the selected Series. This corresponds to the category/value of the x axis.
attribute.name: selectedPoint

attribute.description: Type of the charts, possible values are line, area, column and bar
attribute.name: name

attribute.description: Datasource of the component, can be a Collection or Map type. Provide either a value, a model or chartseries as children declared in the xhtml file.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Name of the request scoped variable used as iterator for value
attribute.name: var

attribute.description: Type of this series. If not provided, it defaults to the chart's type.
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: Layout for the legend, possible values are vertical and the default horizontal.
attribute.name: layout

attribute.description: ValueExpression of the value of a point, bar,... Only valid if used in combination with value.
attribute.name: point

attribute.description: ValueExpression of the id of a point. Only valid if used in combination with value.
attribute.name: pointId

attribute.description: ValueExpression of the name of a point. Only valid if used in combination with value.
attribute.name: pointName

attribute.description: ValueExpression of the color of a point. Only valid if used in combination with value. You can either provide a HTML color string or a numeric value in combination with a color axis.
attribute.name: pointColor

attribute.description: ValueExpression of the point's parent id. Only valid if used in combination with value. The resolved value has to match another point's id.
attribute.name: pointParentId

attribute.description: By default, blocks are created from left to right. Set this to true if you have long labels and want the blocks to be wider.
attribute.name: alternateStartingDirection

attribute.description: For which level of the hierarchy this component should be used.
attribute.name: level

attribute.description: LayoutAlgorithm for the the panels on this level, possible values are squarified and sliceAndDice.
attribute.name: layout

attribute.description: Where to draw the label of the panels on this level. Possible values are none, ne,n,nw,e,center,w,se,s,sw
attribute.name: labelPosition

attribute.description: CSS like style attributes for the label, separated with semicolon. Use e.g. fontSize:15px;fontWeight:bold
attribute.name: labelStyle
